metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17360 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. a heap-based buffer over-read in bfd_getl32 in libbfd.c allows an attacker to cause a denial of service through a crafted PE file. This vulnerability can be triggered by the executable objdump.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
